entry.title: $2400 // Nice bedrooms with @@ closet space and a nice big living room
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 22588
2 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Knickerbocker Av (M), DeKalb Av (L), Kosciuszko St (J). GREAT LOCATION IN A VIBRANT AREA !! This apartment has 1 same size bedrooms with closet space and a nice big living room. The kitchen is modern and features Stainless Steel appliances. Laundry in the building!!! Located on Myrtle ave and Wilson ave you are steps away from the Kosciuszko St (J,M,Z) trains. Great spots within walking distance: Radio Shack , Citibank , Rite Aid Pharmacy, Maria Hernandez Park and many more!!!

AMENITIES
Central A/C
Hardwood Floors
Natural Light in Living Area
Laundry in building
Stainless Steel Appliances
Stone countertops

entry.title: $2299 // SPACIOUS 1br in Prime Williamsburg! Heat and HW Included!
entry.content:
HUGE 1 bedroom in elevator building in Prime Williamsburg. This lovely apartment has exposed brick in the massive living room and king size bedroom, along with a separate eat-in kitchen w/ stainless steel appliances. Heat & hot water included in rent.

Outstanding location right around the corner from Marcy JMZ or short walk to the Bedford L, both of which are only one stop from Manhattan! Building has elevator and on-site super.

First & security to move in
NO BROKERS FEE!
Contact Dave to schedule a viewing!
